sourcesContent:
üéõÔ∏è Tableau de Bord Administrateur

{{ section.title }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AdminService } from '../admin.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent { // Structure des donn√©es pour chaque section banner = { title: '', image: null, description: '', ctaLink: '' }; event = { title: '', image: null, description: '', date: '' }; ad = { title: '', image: null, description: '', link: '' }; video = { title: '', videoUrl: '', description: '' }; product = { name: '', image: null, price: '', description: '' }; testimonial = { author: '', image: null, testimonialText: '' }; news = { title: '', content: '', image: null, date: '' }; // Liste des sections √† afficher sections = [ { key: 'banner', title: 'Banni√®re' }, { key: 'event', title: '√âv√©nement' }, { key: 'ad', title: 'Publicit√©' }, { key: 'video', title: 'Vid√©o' }, { key: 'product', title: 'Produit' }, { key: 'testimonial', title: 'T√©moignage' }, { key: 'news', title: 'Actualit√©' } ]; expandedSection: string | null = null; visibleForms: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; constructor(private adminService: AdminService) {} // G√©rer le changement de fichier (image) onFileChange(event: any, field: string) { const file = event.target.files[0]; switch (field) { case 'bannerImage': this.banner.image = file; break; case 'eventImage': this.event.image = file; break; case 'adImage': this.ad.image = file; break; case 'productImage': this.product.image = file; break; case 'testimonialImage': this.testimonial.image = file; break; case 'newsImage': this.news.image = file; break; } } // Fonction pour soumettre le formulaire submitForm(sectionKey: string) { let formData = new FormData(); switch (sectionKey) { case 'banner': formData.append('title', this.banner.title); formData.append('description', this.banner.description); formData.append('ctaLink', this.banner.ctaLink); formData.append('image', this.banner.image); this.adminService.addBanner(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Banni√®re ajout√©e avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de la banni√®re', error); }); break; case 'event': formData.append('title', this.event.title); formData.append('description', this.event.description); formData.append('date', this.event.date); formData.append('image', this.event.image); this.adminService.addEvent(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('√âv√©nement ajout√© avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de l\'√©v√©nement', error); }); break; case 'ad': formData.append('title', this.ad.title); formData.append('description', this.ad.description); formData.append('link', this.ad.link); formData.append('image', this.ad.image); this.adminService.addAd(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Publicit√© ajout√©e avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de la publicit√©', error); }); break; case 'video': formData.append('title', this.video.title); formData.append('description', this.video.description); formData.append('videoUrl', this.video.videoUrl); this.adminService.addVideo(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Vid√©o ajout√©e avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de la vid√©o', error); }); break; case 'product': formData.append('name', this.product.name); formData.append('price', this.product.price); formData.append('description', this.product.description); formData.append('image', this.product.image); this.adminService.addProduct(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Produit ajout√© avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout du produit', error); }); break; case 'testimonial': formData.append('author', this.testimonial.author); formData.append('testimonialText', this.testimonial.testimonialText); formData.append('image', this.testimonial.image); this.adminService.addTestimonial(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('T√©moignage ajout√© avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout du t√©moignage', error); }); break; case 'news': formData.append('title', this.news.title); formData.append('content', this.news.content); formData.append('date', this.news.date); formData.append('image', this.news.image); this.adminService.addNews(formData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Actualit√© ajout√©e avec succ√®s!', response); }, error => { console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de l\'actualit√©', error); }); break; } } // Fonction pour afficher ou cacher le formulaire toggleForm(section: string, event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); this.visibleForms[section] = !this.visibleForms[section]; } isFormVisible(section: string): boolean { return this.visibleForms[section] || false; } // Fonction pour d√©velopper une section (exemple) expandSection(section: string, event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); this.expandedSection = this.expandedSection === section ? null : section; } isExpanded(section: string): boolean { return this.expandedSection === section; } }
